name: Hot Soul Laser Beam
description:
Hot Soul Laser Beam is a Hot Soul Laser Beam simulation.

[ARROW KEYS] or [IJKL] to Move
[SPACE] to Shoot
[X] to Dash
[ENTER] to Pause
Shooting and Dashing will build up Heat. Stop shooting to remove Heat.
Dashing damages enemies and destroys bullets.
Collecting lots of powerups will get you a new friend.

Presented by SuperTry Studios

Hot Soul by Joe Kenneally

Laser Beam by Kevin Cole

This game exists because of our cool patrons.
